channel.title: Zombie-scape this server has guns!
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][size=20pt]EDIT: WHEN I .RARED THE SERVER SERVER.INI GOT DELETED. ADD IT WITH THE OTHER .JAVAS IN THE [u][b]SERVER[/b][/u](Its just below here you cant attach .inis sorry)[/size][/font]
Or not you cannt upload .inis soooooooooooooooooooooooooo
Save a file as server.ini with the others and put this in.
[code]ClientRequired=0 WorldId=3 ServerPort=43594 [/code] Make sure it is saved as server.ini and not server.ini.txt
Well I made this server in the hopes that it would be good. I never got any players (Cause of my crappy comp + Advertising :( ) Hopefully someone here will like it I spent a lot of time doing this and I am quite sad at the moment :( Ummmm I couldn't put the guns in because I didn't make them but they are in the client just not the .gzip so u can only use if you use my client. Yeah, hopefully you will like. You could probably get lots of people if Mopar server Status worked for you sadly its just convinced my servers are always offline so I never get any players. Ummmm Contains two quests made by me fully. Save My Husband. Pickaxe of Destiny(Unlocks Mining and Fishing/Cooking skills)
More of a storyline server.
Changed a lot of textures etc. Made snow (Thanks Lin for the idea)
Lots of Guns plus attachments (All working)
Made lots of new handlers to reduce client.java
Removed tonnes of shit from client.java.
Fully working points system with 15 levels.
Ummmm the client has clickable links, Coloured sendmessages etc
Not working on this anymore EVER Period
Credits to Wayzey for ALL of the models.
Zombies in Port Sarim, Barbarians Village, Falador, Lumbridge and Varrock.
This is not advertising as the server doesnt exsist any more but some new Quest Ideas/Minigame Ideas were posted on Zombiescape.darkbb.com if you want to use them. (Remember forums no longer active so no point saying its advertising or whatever)
Client contains New Quest + Achievments interface, A new Note kinda thing for long texts and some other interfaces from bluurs. (Class9.java)
Client has model preloading in built. That means that u put the models in .dat format in the External folder in the cache and u dont have to do add model or anything and ur cache doesnt get broken YAY!.
I have put lots of work into this. Those pictures of the gun gfx are outdated and now the guns shoot the amount of arrows that they shoot bullets (IF that makes sense)
Well I did a lot more actually: Login with enter on client side. A lot of cache edits. This was a Deltascape source but I took out all of the shit. I did break the cache so that Original Runescape items dont weild unless you add them to potions.java I did it on purpose so that people couldn't abuse them. Full Donator system. Full Black mark system. Added: ItemOnItem.java ObjectClick.java ObjectClick2.java NpcClick.java CommandHandler.java And I think some others. Also added that world map thing. Also I made a combatLevel thing in NpcHandler so that Npcs auto attack if ur CB is below a certain level. My nice helpful buttons thing. I custom made the Equipment tab. (Interface editing client side LEARN IT [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=375533.0;topicseen]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=375533.0;topicseen[/url]
Ummm yeah Basically find out the rest for yourself.
[IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/Start.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/Start1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/Zombiewithlegmalfunctions.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape/start7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Arrival1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Classinfo1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Start12.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Start123.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Weaponshop2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/Weapons1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/Zombiescape%20Pictures/ammo1.jpg[/img]
Almost forgot in my sadness here is the download link for Client + Server. <snip />
Well there it is I did it released it to u leechers.
Edit: How to change the ip in the client for retards like ScoobyGod.
Open Gui.java
[code] private Gui(String args[]) { super(); try {
Serverip = "0.0.0.0"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip)); initUI(); } catch(Exception ex) { ex.printStackTrace(); } }[/code]
Change Serverip to the ip u want. That block of code is right at the top. Just search for [code]sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));[/code]

item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:432, topic:286208”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=378544.msg3761335#msg3761335 date=1316896935]

In my opinion… Guns doesn’t fit in a RSPS.

In my opinion… You probably clicked on the wrong thread then.

fix textures… the land is literally white in ur pics. Rs is never in winter rofl…

Fix them yourself. I turned them white on purpose, I like it snowing. If you had actually checked, you would’ve seen that only the grass has been changed to white to look like snow.
[/quote]

forgot to mention, not dling this =P[/quote]

And why does that qualify your assumption that if something doesn’t fit your opinion it needs to be ‘fixed’ as if it is a glitch/bug?

Read full topic
